amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt any consent decree or settlement agreement pertaining to the improvement or maintenance of air or water quality.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 115-363 to exempt any consent decree or settlement agreement pertaining to the improvement or maintenance of air or water quality.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McEachin amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 226 (Roll no. 586).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. McEachin.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
